video_prompt: An oversized white double-decker RV advances along a winding road through a vibrant autumn forest. Its tinted windows reveal illuminated modern interiors and an upper-level balcony. The surrounding autumn leaves gently move, and distant hills shift into view as the vehicle progresses.
image_prompt: A unique, large, white double-decker RV or motorhome, resembling a modified semi-truck with a balcony and modern interior, travels on a winding paved autumn road through a vibrant forest of red, orange, and yellow leaves. Clear, bright natural light, pale blue sky, and distant hazy hills. A sense of leisure and adventure.
refined_video_prompt: An RV continuously progresses, following a curving trajectory. The background dynamically shifts as hills emerge and recede. Surrounding foliage gently sways and rustles in response to the motion and ambient air currents.
